tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor explained the issue clearly and suggested their recommendations. They're very friendly with my Child during the check up. Thank you for your kindness.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Sudhakar has been our family dentist for more than a decade. He has treated tooth ache, extraction, root canal and other dental procedures for our family members in several instances. Very hygienic clinic, highly sterilized instruments and a thorough professional approach are some of the great qualities of gift smile and Dr.Sudhakar. Recently my wife underwent tooth extraction and impaction on wisom tooth. Initially we were afraid about this procedure but Dr.Sudhakar made this a hassle free procedure and the healing was also quick. Extremely satisfied with this treatment as well. Highly recommend gift smile clinic for any dental ailments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thanks to Dr.Rafiya Sardar for recommending this clinic. It's One of the great places for dental treatment. The aesthetic is good. The sister's (Nurse's/technician) are well behaved and they took care of me so well, I am impressed. Because I didn't see this kind of hospitality in any other clinic. Kudos for the gift smile dental clinic. I couldn't resist myself to talk about Dr.Sudhakar, he is the best. Within few seconds, he is completed my extraction. It was awesome. Now I am pain free, The full credit goes to Gift smile dental clinic and Dr.Sudhakar.
reply_text: Thank you so much Arsheya. It was a pleasure treating you at Gift Smile

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My case was complicated because I had a fractured tooth and a broken tooth, I had visited many dentist and all were telling me that the broken tooth needs extraction and my treatment would take months, but here Doctor used a innovative method to preserve my tooth and also gave me excellent Aesthetics, and the work was completed in just 2 sittings in less than 10 days time.Extraordinary and commendable work by Dr.Sudhakar and his team..!! I Highly recommend him.
reply_text: Thank you Mr. Azharuddin. That was a pleasure serving you and you said it right it was my TEAM. That's our strength. Thank you once again

review: I had gap in between my teeth and has sensitivity problem. Doctor explained me clearly about my teeth problem and also explained about the solution what to do further. And given some options to choose for rectifying my issues. Thanks for the whole team. They are doing their level best in satisfying their patients needs.

context: Painful Teething,Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,Sensitive Teeth,Dental Cavities,Denture Problems,
review: Dr. Sudhakar and his team is really superb and his procedure is so immaculate and perfect that I recommend everyone whoever has such issues must consult him. The clinic has all modern gadgets and as far as cleanliness and covid protocol are concerned they are perfectly well in place. Dr. Sudhakar and Dr. Mam both are courteous and makes his/ her patients cool down before any procedure. once again I would like to thanks them to.make our experience seemless.
reply_text: Thank you so much for the kind words. This feedback is what keeps us running.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Extremely extremely sorry for the delay in responding to the feedback as I'm a banker and due to lock down I'm replying late.

Well let me start with Dr.Sudhakar..this was my first time visit and ladies and gentlemen please trust me he is simply amazing.the way he handles the patient and explains is extremely satisfactying. He is a great Doctor
Secondly would like to talk about Dr rafiya as well. She was extremely good and handled my pain and tooth problem with extreme grace and cleared me from the pain I had.

On a serious note I have already decided not only for me but for me and my entire family and friends will be consulting only Dr.sudhakar and Dr.Rafiya.
As both are extremely caring and great in there respective Profession.

Thank you Doctor.
